DataElement.preferredName: Administration, Management Performed Study Activity Information Source Type Code PCORnet CDM Enrollment Basis Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Performing or possessing executive duties; acting as a supervisor or manager._Executed and carried through to completion._A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it._An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions._Knowledge derived from study, experience, or instruction that has been gathered or received by communication._Where something is available or from where it originates._A coded value specifying an identifiable class of an entity or activity based on common qualities._ENR_BASIS is a property of the time period defined. A patient can have multiple entries in the table.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created manually based on BRIDG 5.1 for CDM. 8.27.18 mc

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: ENR_BASIS is a property of the time period defined. A patient can have multiple entries in the table..

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A time period of care where the start and stop dates are populated from the earliest observed encounter and latest observed encounter.

Concepts.definition: A time period of care where the start and stop dates are populated from the earliest observed encounter and latest observed encounter.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An assertion of complete data capture between the start and end dates, based on a locally developed or applied algorithm, often using multiple criteria.

Concepts.definition: An assertion of complete data capture between the start and end dates, based on a locally developed or applied algorithm, often using multiple criteria.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An assertion of complete data capture between the start and end dates based upon geographic characteristics, such as regional isolation.

Concepts.definition: An assertion of complete data capture between the start and end dates based upon geographic characteristics, such as regional isolation.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A time period of care where the start and stop dates are based on when the patient's outpatient drug costs are covered by their personal medical insurance plan.

Concepts.longName: Period of Outpatient Prescription Drug Coverage for Enrollment Basis
Concepts.definition: A time period of care where the start and stop dates are based on when the patient's outpatient drug costs are covered by their personal medical insurance plan.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A time period of care where the start and stop dates are based on when the patient's costs are covered by their personal medical insurance plan.

Concepts.longName: Period of Medical Insurance Coverage for Enrollment Basis
Concepts.definition: A time period of care where the start and stop dates are based on when the patient's costs are covered by their personal medical insurance plan.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: means by which services are paid for.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

Concepts.definition: A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.
